about_zagora.title: About the Women’s Agrotourism Cooperative & the Agricultural Cooperative
about_zagora.paragraph1: The women of our cooperative, using the pure and high-quality local products of the fertile land of Pelion, revive the rich culinary culture they inherited and produce traditional sweets and jams using time-honored methods.
about_zagora.paragraph2: The Zagora Agricultural Cooperative is one of the oldest cooperatives in Greece.
about_zagora.paragraph3: The trademark is officially registered, and every authentic Zagorin apple carries the distinctive sticker that sets it apart. In 1996, recognition came with the “Protected Designation of Origin” label from the European Union, and Zagorin apples began traveling all over the world.
quick_facts: Zagora is the largest village in Pelion
The Starking Delicious apple variety was introduced to the Zagora area of Pelion in the early 1950s
Rigas Feraios received his early education in Zagora
